channel.title: Rune(-)MTP 634 , what i need to do to start the server?
channel.description:
when i try to start the "run.bat" file in the server file it says:
[img]http://C:\Users\Daniel Laptop\Pictures\iPod Photo Cache/Unbenannt[/img]
(The command "java" is wrong written or couldn't be found)
Can someone tell me please what i have to type in that the run.bat file starts ( I have java(32 bit) saved in program files (x86)
and in the client file the "run.bat" file don't start to (I have jdk 1.7.0_05)
